name: M0LY
description:
Manage your battery!!!

At the right upper corrner you see your battery.

Don't run out of your battery or else you BLOW UP!

Controlls

WA to move Horizontaly!

D or Space to Jump!

S to Turn Off/On!

R to Restart and Q to Exit!

M0LY is a reaserch robot who was send to build cities on mars in 2148.

Sadly now Robot is old and his battery is weak.

But somebody is  repairing batteries far away in cave!

Go there to have your battery replaced!!!
